summary: The 'Streamlining NEPA for Coal Act' (H.R. 4068) aims to expedite coal production and export. It mandates the Secretary of the Interior to identify existing and potential categorical exclusions under the National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) that could facilitate these activities. This identification must be reported to the House Committee on Natural Resources and the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources within 30 days of the Act's enactment.
